questions.question: What results are you looking for?
How old are you?
How do you expect hair loss treatment to impact your life?
Which treatment plan would you prefer?
questions.note: Final treatment plans are shared decisions determined with your clinician after this online assessment. Always read the leaflet and treatment plan.

questions.question: Which image best matches your hair loss?
Do you have any scalp problems?
Please be more specific.
Have you seen a clinician about the soreness/redness in order to get a diagnosis and/or received treatment?
questions.rejectReasoning: We cannot recommend you prescription hair loss treatment as it may not be suitable for you. We would advise seeing your GP for a face to face consultation, to further assess the nature of this soreness/redness on your scalp.

questions.question: Have you used Minoxidil, Regaine, Finasteride, or Propecia for at least 12 months consistently?
Was Minoxidil or Regaine effective?
Was Finasteride or Propecia effective?

Are any of the following true?
  • I have previously been diagnosed with breast cancer, prostate cancer, or I am currently undergoing PSA (prostate monitoring).
  • I have uncontrolled low or high blood pressure.
  • I am experiencing, or have previously experienced, depression, anxiety or panic disorders.
Have you previously been diagnosed with breast cancer, prostate cancer or are you currently undergoing PSA (prostate monitoring)?
Do you have uncontrolled low or high blood pressure?
Are you experiencing, or have you ever experienced, depression, anxiety or panic disorders?

There are occasional reports of depression and even suicidal thoughts with Finasteride (Propecia). If you are currently stable, and happy to stop this treatment immediately and consult a doctor if this occurs then click to accept you have understood the above.

answers.text: I am not currently stable or don't want to proceed with Finasteride

options.text: I am not currently stable or don't want to proceed with Finasteride

steps.name: UK - hair loss - add to cart - unlicensed - step 6

questions.question:
Do you have any of the following problems?
  • Significant or Chronic Kidney Disease
  • Phaeochromocytoma
  • Heart attack, stroke, or mini-stroke within the last 6 months
  • Chest pain symptoms or any heart rhythm issues
  • Heart valve problems
  • Disease of the heart muscles
  • Get breathless or have chest pain with light exertion, such as walking briskly for 20 minutes or climbing two flights of stairs

steps.name: UK - hair loss - add to cart - unlicensed - step 7

questions.question: Do you have any allergies (e.g. Lactose, Minoxidil, Finasteride or Dutasteride)?
Are you allergic to any of the following?

If we recommend a tablet medication in your plan it can contain very small amounts of lactose. If you have previously taken most tablet formulations without causing any symptoms then it is unlikely that you will get undesirable effects from the lactose within our tablets.

answers.text: I am happy to proceed to being assessed for prescription
I can't tolerate even small amounts of lactose

options.text: I am happy to proceed to being assessed for prescription
I can't tolerate even small amounts of lactose

steps.name: UK - hair loss - add to cart - unlicensed - step 8

questions.question: Is your scalp susceptible to dryness, irritation or dandruff?

answers.text: No - I don’t want any scalp gentle options
Yes - I want more scalp friendly plans

options.text: No - I don’t want any scalp gentle options
Yes - I want more scalp friendly plans

steps.name: UK - hair loss - add to cart - unlicensed - step 9

questions.question: Which of the following would you need to be consistent with treatment?
questions.note: (Application refers to how often you need to use the treatment)

questions.question: Which are important to you?

answers.note: (as typical treatments, e.g. Regaine, haven’t worked for me)

options.note: (as typical treatments, e.g. Regaine, haven’t worked for me)

outro.txt: Congratulations! You're suitable for hair loss treatment
We've already helped over 200,000 customers with their wellbeing

questions.question:
Lastly, do you agree and consent to the following?
  • I am male, between 18 and 65 years old and live in the UK.
  • I will be the sole user of any medication offered to me through this service.
  • All answers are provided by me and will be completely truthful
  • I am aware that minoxidil 10% spray, minoxidil spray with topical finasteride, and oral minoxidil are prescribed as unlicensed products

attributes.name: Get Content Based on Questionnaire Answers

complete-hair-loss-plan.heading: Finasteride & Minoxidil Combined
complete-hair-loss-plan.text: Combining the two most effective ingredients for hair loss, Finasteride & Minoxidil, into easy-to-use treatments.

all-in-one-dht.heading: DHT Blocker and Minoxidil Combined
all-in-one-dht.text: Combining the two most effective ingredients for hair loss, DHT Blockers & Minoxidil, into easy-to-use treatments.

dht-blockert.heading: DHT Blocker Plans
dht-blockert.text: Perfect for enhanced hair growth and prevention
